solution_line_template: Debelyn had {debelyn_initial_dolls} - {debelyn_gave_andrena} = <<{debelyn_initial_dolls}-{debelyn_gave_andrena}={debelyn_remaining_dolls}>>{debelyn_remaining_dolls} dolls left after giving out {debelyn_gave_andrena} dolls to Christel.

Christel had {christel_initial_dolls} - {christel_gave_andrena} = <<{christel_initial_dolls}-{christel_gave_andrena}={christel_remaining_dolls}>>{christel_remaining_dolls} dolls after giving Andrena {christel_gave_andrena} dolls.

Therefore, Andrena has {andrena_total_dolls} - {debelyn_remaining_dolls} = <<{andrena_total_dolls}-{debelyn_remaining_dolls}={andrena_more_than_debelyn}>>{andrena_more_than_debelyn} more dolls than Debelyn.
